statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory;
SELECT purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_purchase DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_products > 3
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, purchase_date FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, price FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE price > 100;
SELECT MAX(price), MIN(price), AVG(price) FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM Customer WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM Customer WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Product WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price DESC, product_category ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_gender FROM Customer WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age, customer_gender FROM Customer WHERE customer_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_age DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, recommendation_date FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 50;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name AS name, product_name AS product, transaction_amount AS amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
